pages.text: $(li)Candles are a new light source block.$(br)$(li)The fire of them can be extingued if water hits on the flame and they can be fired on with a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l).

$(li)They can be dyed placing a Candle and the specific Dye and used to craft $(l:patchouli:decoration/buzzier_bees/scented_candle)Scented Candles$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)Soul Candles are a new variant of the Candles.$(br)$(li)Unlike Candles, Soul Candles procudes blue flames like the color flames produced if you use a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l) on a soulsand block.
$(li)Ender Candles are other variant of the Candles.$(br)$(li)Unlike Candles or Soul Candles, those produce purple flames instead.
